snippet.title: Vile Matter - Gameplay Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The first official gameplay trailer for Vile Matter from Decoy Software. Vile Matter will be available on Steam, Itch.io, and Gamejolt in Winter 2020!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1196970/Vile_Matter/
Itch.io: https://decoysoftware.itch.io/vilematter
Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/vilematter/449145
